Name: Watcher
Description: One of the more annoying Melfs to fight against. Just when you close in, he just prances away another half mile and makes indecent comments about your sister.

Attacks.Attack Description: Archery is utilized by mankind, but the Melves had it first. The average Melven Watcher can put a shot between the eyes of a fly while upside down from a hundred feet away. That is an entirely legitimate and highly provable fact.
